user_query: I'm organizing a workshop on healthy eating habits. Can you provide me with a list of healthcare professionals who can deliver informative sessions? Additionally, analyze the nutritional data for the snacks we'll be serving and suggest healthier alternatives. Moreover, share the vaccination guidelines for adults to ensure a safe environment.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of healthcare professionals available for delivering sessions on healthy eating habits.
Collect nutritional data for the snacks planned for the workshop.
Analyze the collected nutritional data and suggest healthier alternatives for the snacks.
Obtain vaccination guidelines for adults to ensure a safe environment for the workshop.
